name: Vampire Problems
description:
What the hell is that? Garlic Sales? Freelance ghoul hunters? Pity gongfarmers who ruin you Crypt Bat Farm?

You gotta sort the problems of the vampire in distress trapped in its own castle. And get uninvited guests out of your coffins.


Versions:

0.4.1 - release build

0.4.2 - fix music/sound volume bug
